content.text:
# War with the Robots

War with the Robots (pub: 1962) is a collection of science fiction stories, written by Harry Harrison in 1956â€“1961. The collection is tied together by a central theme of robots being able to do things better than humans.
The collection includes the short stories:
*"Simulated Trainer"
*"The Velvet Glove"
*"Arm of the Law"
*"The Robot Who Wanted to Know"
*"I See You"
*"The Repairman"
*"Survival Planet"
*"War with the Robots"
References
*
